column1: Good stuff [This review was collected as part of a promotion.]
Great lotion recommended by my dermotoligist.

I order this item standard shipping and received it 3 days later. Second time I order this item and I recommend . Elta gives my skin a beautiful tone, as soon as I apply it I see a difference. Love it, works great.
I love this product but I have ordered it twice in the last month and it has not been shipped!
